thread.title: Definitelynottheguyyourethinkingof

author: Definitelynottheguyyourethinkingof
title: Definitelynottheguyyourethinkingof
text: I just recently bought a new computer and have been bugging my friends about playing eith me. I had literally just bought a game off steam for about 35 dollars and my friend later said that the game was on Bundlestars for just 8 bucks.im supet impressed with the speed of the purchase and how fast i was actually able to get a steamcode. Im definitely going to keep returning to this site.
